title: Let’s just wait and see
author: VD
content_html:
If you paid your mortgage off, it means you probably did not manage your funds efficiently over the years. It’s as if you had 500,000 dollar bills stuffed in your mattress…. [It’s] very unsophisticated.’
— David Lereah, chief economist of the National Association of Realtors

I just wanted to note that down somewhere where I could find it later. This strikes me as famous last words.
